articles.title: Rampant Napoli thrash Juventus to open up 10-point advantage in Serie A - The Guardian
articles.description: Victor Osimhen scored twice and Khvicha Kvaratskhelia once as Napoli thrashed title rivals Juventus 5-1 and opened up a 10-point lead at the top of Serie A
articles.content:
Two of Napolis most influential players combined for what could be their most crucial win in this campaign and brought Juventuss recent revival to a juddering halt.
